name: crosswordcoach
description: A tool for drilling crossword clues quickly

scripts.generate-api-lambda-zip: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run create-api-lambda-package-dir && npm run npm-init-api-lambda-package && npm run merge-api-lambda-package-jsons && npm run install-api-lambda-dependencies && npm run build-api-lambda-package && npm run copy-api-lambda-deps && npm run zip-api-lambda-package
scripts.install-vite-for-gh-actions: cd frontend_dist && npm install vite --verbose && npm install @vitejs/plugin-react-swc --verbose
scripts.copy-frontend-and-common-and-storage-fil: cd frontend_dist && mkdir frontend && mkdir common && mkdir storage && cp -r ../frontend/* ./frontend && cp -r ../common/* ./common && cp -r ../storage/* ./storage
scripts.generate-frontend-dist: npm run create-frontend-dist-dir && npm run npm-init-frontend-dist && npm run merge-frontend-dist-jsons && npm run install-frontend-dist-dependencies && npm run install-vite-for-gh-actions && npm run copy-tsconfig-json && npm run copy-frontend-and-common-and-storage-files && npm run type-check-frontend-dist && npm run vite-build-frontend-dist
